attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dave Coombs is a lovely bloke who keeps a pub in bolton. kicked in the b......cks for most of his life he has a fun loving pub in bolton, until that is 1st July..... when NO SMOKING DAY CAME IN. He let all the no smoking coaches come into the car park - result -no coaches. All the awaited no smoking families - result - no families.Then, Bolton Council came and said the neighbours of houses built 2 years ago behind the pub objected to the noise in the beer (smoking) garden. David said shall we join British Leyland, etc etc and give up. It is up to you dear UK people. 1984 is with us a bit later. Personally Mr Brown give me 30k and will p.ss off to Spain and never return.´Sad my relatives fought 39-45.
